text:
[Verse]
Stars are shining bright
Up in the night
Feel the cool breeze
Underneath the trees

[Verse 2]
Twirl around the moon
Heaven's coming soon
Dance until the dawn
Our worries are gone

[Chorus]
Moonlight dance tonight
Everything's alright
In this silver glow
Let our spirits flow

[Bridge]
Hearts are beating fast
Make this moment last
Laugh until we cry
Underneath the sky

[Chorus]
Moonlight dance tonight
Everything's alright
In this silver glow
Let our spirits flow

[Verse]
Steps so light and free
Just you and me
Holding on so tight
In the pale moonlight
title: Moonlight Dance
